name: Step sisters: Episode 2
description:
Step sisters: Episode 2 - second episode of Visual Novel by Hanae Novels. Main character teenage girl Alison was secretly in love with her elder step sister Natalie.
Plot is based on very sweet love story. Alison moved to college where Natalie studies. Try to find out how their relationships will keep on going. And find out about their mother's secret.Main features:
  • Realistic backgrounds

  • Relaxing background music

  • Many Steam Achievements

Just relax and enjoy the story!
